item.description:
I just found out about this from the Greater Hartford Arts Council's 7-Day A&E Forecast.  Their description reads:  "Watch a screening of Buster Keaton’s silent film The General featuring original live music by Karen Krinjak at the Grand Piano. $10 suggested donation at door. 860-647-9824" for more information.

Location website:  cheneyhall.org where they say "Come watch a great silent movie featuring Buster Keaton in "The General" with original music by Karen Krinjak at the grand piano!   What a fun event this will be! A great way to remember the brilliance of the silent film era, and an opportunity to expose youngsters to what the movies used to be like! Yes, we'll have treats at intermission!"

The movie starts at 7:00pm, so I set the meetup a few minutes earlier.

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: Buster Keatonâ€™s "The General" with live music
